rules.name: Documentation Structure
rules.description: All documentation should follow a clear structure with a title, description, and examples.

rules.name: API Documentation
rules.description: All API endpoints must have documentation that includes parameters, return values, and error codes.

rules.name: Code Comments
rules.description: All functions and methods should have JSDoc or similar comments explaining their purpose, parameters, and return values.

rules.name: Markdown Files
rules.description: Each component or module should have an accompanying .md file with usage examples.

rules.name: Confluence Export
rules.description: All documentation should be exportable to Confluence for team visibility.
